name: Mallikarjuna Maneri
title: Full Stack Java Developer
tagline: Building scalable enterprise applications with Java, Spring Boot, and modern web technologies

featuredApp.name: ANZ Banking Automation
featuredApp.description: Developed comprehensive automation testing framework using Taiko, reducing manual testing efforts by 30% and improving cross-browser test coverage by 40%.

about.intro: Results-driven Full Stack Java Developer with 2+ years of hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable enterprise web applications. Specialized in Java, Spring Boot, React.js, and modern automation frameworks, with a strong foundation in building high-performance, reliable solutions that deliver exceptional business value.
about.details: Experienced in the complete software development lifecycle, from requirement analysis and system design to development, testing, deployment, and maintenance. Proficient in RESTful API development, microservices architecture, database optimization, and automation testing. Strong advocate of clean code principles, test-driven development, and continuous improvement. Demonstrated ability to reduce manual testing efforts, optimize system performance, and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams in Agile environments.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Building robust and scalable server-side applications using Java and Spring Boot.

services.description: Creating responsive and interactive user interfaces with React.js and modern web technologies.

services.description: Developing comprehensive test automation frameworks to ensure software quality and reliability.

services.title: API Development
services.description: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs for seamless system integration and communication.

services.title: Microservices
services.description: Architecting and developing microservices-based applications for scalability and maintainability.

services.title: DevOps & CI/CD
services.description: Implementing continuous integration and deployment pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.

education.institution: Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology
education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.subtitle: Automation Testing & Full Stack Development
experience.description: Developed a JavaScript-based automation testing framework using Taiko, reducing manual testing efforts by 30%. Improved cross-browser test coverage by 40% and reduced bug leakage by 25%. Collaborated with backend teams to integrate test automation into CI/CD pipelines.

experience.subtitle: Backend & Frontend Development
experience.description: Built and optimized RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and developed frontend interfaces with React.js for an online exam portal. Reduced API response times by 20% through query optimization and caching strategies. Improved admin panel efficiency by 15% with enhanced UI/UX.

testimonials.name: ANZ Banking Automation Framework
testimonials.review: Developed comprehensive automation testing framework using Taiko for ANZ banking applications. Reduced manual testing by 30% and improved test coverage by 40%.

testimonials.name: Online Exam Portal
testimonials.review: Built scalable exam management system with Spring Boot backend and React.js frontend. Optimized API performance by 20% and enhanced admin efficiency by 15%.

testimonials.name: RESTful API Gateway
testimonials.review: Designed and implemented microservices-based API gateway for enterprise application integration. Handled 10,000+ requests per minute with 99.9% uptime.

achievements.title: Performance Optimization Expert
achievements.description: Successfully optimized application performance across multiple projects, achieving 20% average improvement in API response times and database query execution.

achievements.title: Automation Testing Pioneer
achievements.description: Pioneered automation testing initiatives at ANZ, reducing manual testing efforts by 30% and improving bug detection by 25% through comprehensive test coverage.

achievements.title: LeetCode Problem Solver
achievements.description: Solved 200+ algorithmic problems on LeetCode, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and deep understanding of data structures and algorithms.

achievements.title: Full Stack Development
